data.content:
verb
-plies; -plied; -plying
[+ obj] :to put or spread (something) again on a surface, a part of the body, etc.
She reapplied her makeup.
The finish needs to be reapplied.
[no obj] :to ask formally for something (such as a job, admission to a school, a loan, etc.) again usually in writing
She plans to reapply to the school.
He reapplied for the job.
[+ obj] :to cause (force, pressure, etc.) to have an effect or to be felt again
The defense reapplied the pressure in the second half.
